text: nissandeh allaah ne eemaanavaalon se unake praan aur unake maal isake badale mein khareed lie hai ki unake lie jannat hai. ve allaah ke maarg mein ladate hai, to ve maarate bhee hai aur maare bhee jaate hai. yah unake zimme tauraat, inajeel aur quraan mein (kiya gaya) ek pakka vaada hai. aur allaah se badhakar apane vaade ko poora karanevaala ho bhee kaun sakata hai? atah apane us saude par khuî€¼shiyaan manao, jo sauda tumane usase kiya hai. aur yahee sabase badee saphalata hai
